feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Cloud ABAP Environment
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Cloud ABAP Environment Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: RAP on Dynamic Condition Tables â€“ Draft Enablement Challenge
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

Iâ€™m working on a requirement where the underlying tables are dynamic (condition tables). I need to build a RAP application on top of this setup. However, I'm facing a challenge: I can't enable draft functionality because the CDS view is a query implemented by a class, and draft is not supported in this scenario.

Draft functionality is crucial for my use case. Does anyone have experience with a similar setup or suggestions on how to handle this? Any ideas on enabling draft or dynamically handling such data in a RAP application would be highly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: sap public cloud BADI needed for VF02 release to accounting
entry.content:
Hi Guys, 

I looking for BAdi's for VF01 or VF02 during Acc document creation or release to accounting in SAP public cloud platform .

I tried the following BAdi but these are not triggering

FCI_BADI_INVOICING~FKK_EVENT_2612

ES_SD_BIL_EXTEND~SD_BIL_APM_SET_APP_REASON

FCI_BADI_BILLINGREQUEST~FKK_EVENT_8300

FKK_BADI_SD~FKK_EVENT_4040

the goal is to add the billing document details into a custom table when they proceed to create accounting document number.

please share your input as i am struck with this for almost 3 days.

entry.title: How to restrict Keyboard shortcuts using screen persona script in SAP public cloud ?
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

Is there a way to restrict certain keyboard shortcuts using screen personas, as it is overriding my current script logic and saving the screen thereby generating goods movement document. Otherwise, is it possible to restrict them in ABAP environment by adding a custom logic

I want to restrict Control + Save and Fn + F3. I am able to record session for these in CO11N Transaction as below:

session.findById("wnd[0]").sendVKey(11);


session.findById("wnd[0]").sendVKey(3);

How to restrict or suppress this action?  Thanks in Advance.

entry.title: Production Order Quantity Update Issue in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

 

We are currently working on a custom development in  SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud  using  ABAP RAP model.

Requirement:
We need to update the  Total Quantity  in the Production Order (see screenshot 2), using the value from the  Total Weight  field in our custom RAP screen (screenshot 1).

ðŸ“Ž Attached Screenshots:
- Screenshot 1: RAP Custom Screen (shows Total Weight = 140.000)
- Screenshot 2: Production Order screen (where we want to update the quantity)

What We Tried:
We are using this CDS view:  I_ProductionOrdConfirmationTP
2. Entity:  ProductionOrderConfirmation
3. Field: ConfirmationYieldQuantity

We are triggering the confirmation logic, but the quantity does not reflect in the production order.

Expected Behavior:**
Total Weight (e.g., 140.000) should be passed to the  Total Qty  in the production order after confirmation.

Issue:
Though confirmation is working, the quantity is  not updated  in the standard production order.

Questions:
1. Are we using the right CDS and field?
2. Do we need to use a different service or BAPI for this update in the Public Cloud?
3. Any additional steps to reflect changes in the standard order screen?

Any help is appreciated!

Thanks!

entry.title: S/4 HANA Private Cloud Extensibility - Manage Reservation Items
entry.content:
Hello Folks,

I am looking to extend the standard SAP FIORI App - Manage Reservation Items. Specifically, I would like to add a new filter based on the MARC table (Custom Z field) to filter items records  and a button for goods movement. I would greatly appreciate your suggestions on how to approach this while adhering to the clean core methodology.

Do I need to extend App using Custom Fields App or directly extending the underlying CDS View.

Thank you very much for your assistance.

Best regards,

Sandeep

entry.title: How to Use Standard SAP Tables (BKPF, BSEG) in CDS Views with ABAP Cloud Programming on SAP BTP?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

Iâ€™m currently learning SAP BTP and working with SAP ABAP Cloud Programming for the first time in Eclipse. While creating a CDS View, I noticed that I couldnâ€™t use standard SAP tables like BKPF or BSEG directly in the CDS View.

During my research on how to use standard SAP tables in ABAP Cloud Programming, I found that these tables need to be released first before they can be used in the cloud environment.

Could someone please explain how to release these tables for use in the cloud? Or is there another recommended way to access standard table data in SAP BTP / ABAP Cloud?

Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: BRF+ S4/HANA 2025 BADI code ABAP for key users
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I'm implementing the SD_APM_SET_APPROVAL_REASON badi.

When implementing the badi, it tells me that the ABAP model for key users should be used.

For this badi, a BRF was implemented as the decision-making model.

My issue is that when I try to execute the BRF within the badi, I get the following message:

The use of Class CL_FDT_FUNCTION_PROCESS is not permitted.

I've searched some forums, but they refer to the CL_FDT_FUNCTION_PROCESS_API.

But it doesn't exist on my system.

I've also tried generating a class that inherits from CL_FDT_FUNCTION_PROCESS, but it's defined as final, so I can't inherit its properties.

Is there any other way to run the BRF from the ABAP code for key users?

entry.title: How to restore task standard TS00008267 SAP Workflow
entry.content:
I'm creating a WF project. Part of the development process is creating a decision task, and I accidentally edited standard task 8267 and didn't create a Z.
I only added two new fields and modified the message. I haven't yet transferred the change to quality.
Do you know if it's possible to restore the task or how can I fix this problem? Thank you.

DEV: Changed.

 

QAS: ORIGINAL

entry.title: SAP PO Output Form â€“ Requirement to Consolidate Line Items for Same Material in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello SAPians and Adobe Form Developers,

In SAP Public Cloud, while creating a Purchase Order, I am required to use the same material with different WBS elements as per our business requirements. For example, we may have a single material assigned to 10 different WBS elements, resulting in 10 separate line items in the PO â€” each with the same material code but a different WBS.

This structure works for internal tracking purposes. However, when we share the PO output form with the vendor, we need to present it as a single line item with the cumulative quantity, since from the vendorâ€™s perspective it is a single material without the need to differentiate by WBS.

In the standard SAP Adobe Form, the output currently displays all 10 line items, matching the PO structure in the system.

Could you please advise how we can achieve the following in the Adobe Form output:

  • Display the same material as a single consolidated line item

  • Show total cumulative quantity

  • Retain internal WBS assignment only within the system (not shown in vendor form)

Looking forward to your guidance on how this can be handled through Adobe Form customization

entry.title: SAP CPQ Quote 2.0 Integration with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Sales Order
entry.content: why materials (product master data) go directly through SAP Cloud Integration (CPI), while business partners (customers, contacts) must pass through SAP Master Data Integration (MDI), in the CPI Package

entry.title: How to update custom table in standard RAP event?
entry.content: I have a requirement to update a custom table when a RAP event(create) in Billing Document(R_BillingDocumentTP). But ABAP statement UPDATE/MODIFY are not allowed , throws error "Statement "MODIFY <dbtab>" is not allowed with this status."

entry.title: Not able to find /LRN/S4D400_EXERCISE package
entry.content: I'm currently going through the Acquiring Core ABAP Skills course. As part of the exercises, I'm required to use the package /LRN/S4D400_EXERCISE. However, I'm unable to find this package in the system, despite following all the steps correctly. Could you please guide me on how to access or add this package?

entry.title: How to Assign Business Partner to Communication System in S/4HANA Public Cloud Using CBO or ABAP?
entry.content:
Hi All,

In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, is it possible to assign a Business Partner to a Communication System using Custom Business Object (CBO) or ABAP (via In-App Extensibility)?

If so, what is the recommended approach or workaround to achieve this via coding?

Appreciate any guidance or examples.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: DB Operation SELECT found (BSEG, see Note(s):0002431747) - ATC - S4 readiness
entry.content:
ALL -  during ATC run - error for below in the custom code

Appl. Comp. Check / Check Class / Message Code

BC-DWB-CEX-CCM / CL_CI_TEST_S4H_SEARCH_DB_OPS / SELECT

Details of Analysis

  • DB Operation SELECT found (BSEG, see Note(s):0002431747)

 

  • Finding can be suppressed with pseudo comment "#EC CI_DB_OPERATION_OK[2431747]
  • Referenced Object: BSEG (TABL)
  • Referenced Application Component: FI-GL-GL
  • Change Category of Piecelist Items: T (Technical)
  • SAP Note Number: 0002431747 (General Ledger: Incompatible changes in S
  • Simplification Item Category: I (Syntactically incompatible change of existing functionality)

 

is the above error ( red flag ) in the ATC need to ignore if so what we need to consider - 

 

- Since we are reading data from the BKPF/BSEG - that is for the GL account hence we are good ?

- there is no update / modify , insert - so we are good ?

- SAP recommend the data will still persist in BKPF/BSEG,  equivalent API & CDS are not required ? 

 

#abaper community - how are you handling it ... 

thanks

aakash

entry.title: FNM1 TCODE can not able to use validation with information message
entry.content:
Hi Gurus,

I am having the requirement to get the information message in tcode FNM1 when validation fails. However, when I use the information message in the if_ex_Fvd_loan_post~customer_initial_check  the information message is getting captured in the return table and once the control gets out of this method, it is considering Information,warning messages as ERROR message and further not allowing the posting.  I can bypass it , as it is s4hana by converting the error indicator 'X' with space but how can I get the information message functionality. I have tried with all the function modules related to messages inside this method. But it is getting dump when the fm is called.  Can someone help me with it ?

entry.title: S/4 Cloud: Local Event Consumption not getting triggered
entry.content:
Hi community,

we are on a S/4H Cloud system and we want to consume a standard business event locally.

This is described here (creating a class which is defined for events of a business object interface + a local class with a method to consume a certain event of it):
https://help.sap.com/docs/abap-cloud/abap-rap/business-event-consumption?locale=en-US

Unfortunately the handler method never gets called.

Is there something we are missing? Something to activate a certain event?

I'm used to work with event mesh on BTP (where stuff like communication arrangement SAP_COM_0092, channel binding etc. is necessary on the system).  I thought that local consumption (without going to BTP Event Mesh) does not need anything additional (only a class with a method which is handling the event). Am I wrong?

Thank you
Daniel

entry.title: MIGO BADI in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am looking for a BADI/Enhancement Spot during MIGO ( Standard App : Post Goods Receipt for Purchasing Document). I  know in SAP ECC we have BADI MB_DOCUMENT_BADI which can be leveraged to perform custom functionalities with method MB_DOCUMENT_UPDATE, but not able to find any such released BADI when working in SAP S/4 public cloud edition. 

I know there are some released BADI to check the data for header and line item data but didn't find any which triggers during/after posting the document. In short, I need to print a label once material document is created in the system.

Thank you in advance for the help.
